Description: On US-1 North in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Gayland Ave; Rt. 1627E/W (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to icy conditions.
Label: Minor Incident - Icy Conditions - Advisory

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 50 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-29 in the County of Greene, in the vicinity of Crossover; Dairy Rd; Rt. 633E/W (Greene County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed. The south entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer
